thread.title: Shankar Mahadevan, Ehsaan Noorani, Loy Mendonsa and Piyush Mishra headed to IIT-D
thread.title_full: Shankar Mahadevan, Ehsaan Noorani, Loy Mendonsa and Piyush Mishra headed to IIT-D - The Times of India

author: Umang Aggarwal
title: Shankar Mahadevan, Ehsaan Noorani, Loy Mendonsa and Piyush Mishra headed to IIT-D
text:
Music trio Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy, actor Piyush Mishra, international music act Junkyard Groove and desi band Spud In The Box will perform at IIT Delhi's cultural fest, Rendezvous.
READ: Sachin Tendulkar lends his voice for Swachh Bharat Abhiyan song
The bands will come to the institute for the pro-night on October 17. Piyush Mishra will come for an event called 'Kavi Ki Kalpana' on October 18, and Shankar-Ehsaan-Loy will perform on October 19 for Dhoom, the finale night . While 'She', the student organizers' campaign last year, was for women's empowerment, this year, 'Aashayein' focuses on child rights.
